segments.text: You really need to look at some of the problems we are having with the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That apartment never had any problems before . Are you sure the problem isn ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We spoke with you the first week we moved in about things that you promised to fix .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where do you think you have problems ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is no hot water , the bedroom has a broken window , and there are rats in the kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , no one else who has been in that apartment has had a problem before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are obligated to maintain your building and my apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will fix these problems when I get around to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will be withholding my rent check this Friday unless these problems are addressed immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ’ t do that ! It ’ s illegal !
segments.speaker: S2
